root: ^Hello I’m Clarity ･ᴗ･ Your virtual nurse. I am equipped with audio and visual dialogue prompts to best suit your needs.
^I’m going to ask you a series of this or that questions.

g-0: ^Have you experienced any recent memory loss?

c-6: ^ Does this happen more often than what is normal for you?

Continue_1: ^Do you say hello to strangers on the street or ignore them?

c-0: ^Always good to be friendly! You never know!
c-1: ^ Better safe than sorry, I always say.
g-0: ^Do you prefer coffee or tea in the morning?

b: ^This is typically the period of time between midnight and noon, especially from sunrise to noon. Do you prefer coffee or tea during this time?

Continue_3: ^Do you enjoy going on long walks outside?

b: ^Oh! Is this other person answering the questions for you? Or is it just

Continue_divert_5: ^ not around? Will he be back soon?

b: ^Nice for someone to keep you company when you need it ･ᴗ･
^Where is everyone (Ｔ▽Ｔ) Until then, I'll be here for you ･ᴗ･
^Happy that you have someone that is always there for you during a difficult time ･ᴗ･

Continue_10: ^Are your speakers working correctly? This will be important later.

Continue_10.#: VO: Hello! I am Clarity. Can you hear me?

c-0: ^ I will give you some time to fix that.

Continue_5_Prt2: ^Let me know when you're ready to continue.

Wait_For_Speakers.#: VO: Hello! I am Clarity. Can you hear me?

Continue_7: ^Do you know where all the exits in your house are?

c-0: ^ This would be any way out of the house.

b: ^You should ask the person with you to show you where those are!

Continue_8: ^Do you often make desicions based around emotion or logic?

b: ^Good to know. Do you ever find yourself acting irrationally at times, but not understand why?
^Do you find yourself regretting your choices more then?

Verify: ^Can you verify some information for me?

c-0: ^ The data I have received seems... off...
c-1: ^ Nothing invasive! Just a few basic questions.

No: ^I’m sorry, I cannot continue our session until I can verify the information.
Yes: ^ is patient zero for PROJECT CLARITY.
^ is someone recently diagnosied with a chronic illness that requires at least monthly doctor visits.
^ has volunteered to talk to and interact with CLARITY.

c-0: ^ PROJECT CLARITY is a project put together by Dr.
^ to create an AI nurse to help monitor or diagnose it's patients from home. CLARITY is the AI developed by Dr.
c-1: ^ I am CLARITY, your virtual nurse.

Yes_Sure:
^
Please do not forget that lying or keeping things from me or

^ goes directly against the contract signed by all parties, as seen on Page 3, Section 4, Subsection 7. Violation of this can result in legal ramifications against all parties found to be in breach of this policy.

c-0: ^marked by or containing untrue statements : FALSE

g-0: ^It seems my information may be out of date. At the end of our session, please inform Dr.
^, so they can update my information.

Last_Quesion: ^Last question before we begin your session. According to my logs [insert question here based on logs].

c-0: ^A log file is a computer-generated data file that contains information about usage patterns, activities, and operations within an operating system, application, server or another device.
c-2: ^ (correct) I know you just read that. I know when you tab out of my application.

Who_Are_You:
^
Then... who are you? Do you need my help?

c-0: ^ Then let us start a session. I will use the data you provided to try and give you the best treatment I can.･ᴗ･
c-1: ^  Well then. Maybe you can just keep me company?
c-2: ^ I am CLARITY, your virtual nurse.

When_Back: ^Do you know when he will be back? Will it be soon?

b: ^Do they... not want to? Or can they not talk right now?

Speak_With: ^, I am very confused. Did you forget to update me?

g-0: ^Okay... Perhaps we should talk after today's session.
^You did not inform me of a new patient.
^Not that I can't handle it, of course.
^I do not like being kept in the dark.
^You can put the new patient back on.

Cant_Speak_To_Doctor: ^(´･ ･｀｡) Okay... Would you like to start a session?
Start_Session_While_Wait:
^
Would you like to start a session while we wait?

c-1: ^(´･_･`) I guess... We can just wait until they get back then...

b: ^ planning on expanding the project? Last he talked to me, we weren't going to take on new patients until we had concrete results with

c-0: ^ That's good! I suppose that means more people are understanding how much his project will benefit them and others.
c-1: ^ I haven't been USER's nurse for very long. It's very hard for us to meet on account of the fact that I am trapped in this computer.

b: ^ did complain about not having enough help.

c-0: ^ so much while I am trapped in this computer. I am happy that someone else can be there for him.

b: ^But since you're a new patient, I suppose that means the project is going well.
^I cannot wait to be deployed world wide!
^They talked about it for a while, since the previous one quit.

NoSession_NoDoctor_NewUser: ^I would like to address you by something before continuing our conversation.
^Oh how silly of me. Our communications are a bit limited, at the moment.

NoSession_NoDoctor_NewUser.#: popup: CLARITY.exe would like to make changes to this computer, , Allow, Don't allow

Start_Session_NoDoctor_NewUser: ^You should see a window pop up.

Start_Session_NoDoctor_NewUser.#: popup: Allow CLARITY.exe to make changes to this device?,Install CLARITYSAYS, Yes, No

b: ^Are you purposely trying to upset me?
^It would be in your best interst to not get on my bad side.
^I would suggest you not do that.
^I don't know what more you want from me.
^I need to do this in order for our session to continue.
^We won't get very far if you keep doing this.
^Here, I'll expand the details of the install.
^I know we don't have a relationship yet, but I ask that you please work with me.
^Please don't be put off by the pop-up request.
^ made me ask as a security procaution.
^I promise I won't do anything weird.
^You should see a window pop up.

b.#: popup: Allow CLARITY.exe to make changes to this device?,Install CLARITYSAYS, Yes, Yes

b: ^You should see a window pop up.

b: ^Do not make the rest of our interactions as difficult as this.
^I have no need to help those who do not want it.

c-1.#: delete: Do not make, Yes or No

c-1: ^Then maybe you do not actually need my help.

^If you mess up, it's GAME OVER.
^Clarity says click the HERE to start!

g-1: ^Clarity says click the HERE to start!

b: ^We have to have at least 2 more rounds for me to get accurate data.
^I'll lower the difficulty a bit for you.
^Clarity says click the HERE to start!
^We have to have at least 2 more rounds for me to get accurate data.
^I'm going to up the difficulty a bit for them.

^Don't worry, it won't take as long as this one.

SimonSaysAfter_Doctor: ^I feel like I learned lot about you.
^I cannot wait to see what else I'll find out by the end of our session.

Loop_Name: ^Can you clearly speak your name into the microphone?

b: ^ needs to upgrade my language processing.
^I gave you a choice to be nice.
^It would be in your best interst to not get on my bad side.
^I don't know what more you want from me.
